thread.title: India approves death penalty for raping young girls

title: India approves death penalty for raping young girls
text:
India approves death penalty for raping young girls 11:39am BST - 01:17 
India's cabinet has approved the death penalty for the rape of girls under 12, as public anger grows over a series of high profile cases. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
India's cabinet has approved the death penalty for the rape of girls under 12, as public anger grows over a series of high profile cases. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HPBPQo
